description:
The semi-rimless design creates a massive field of view so trees can’t blindside you. All styles include a a bonus lens.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions
  • Cylindrical Carbonic-X lens with TLT optics provide crisp detail edge-to-edge
  • Fog-X anti-fog inner lens
  • Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • 2-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system
  • Includes a spare yellow with 65% visible light transmission
  • Includes an extra lens and a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith Squad Goggles - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Black/CP Everyday Green M)
Visible Light Transmission (RED ROCK--CHROMAPOP SUN R)
